name: Super Orbit
description:
Danger lurks in the stars. Jump past obstacles to reach your place in the universe. Unlock new lifeforms and explore new heights.

Addictive one button platforming - Jump as high as you can while avoiding various obstacles.

Unlock new characters - Collect coins and unlock all the lifeforms.

Beat your friends' high score - Compete on the leaderboards to get the highest score.
